documentation.text: @dev Helper library for building super agreement

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory) pure external returns (struct ISuperfluid.Context memory)

documentation.text:
@dev Authorize the msg.sender to access token agreement storage
 NOTE:
 - msg.sender must be the expected host contract.
 - it should revert on unauthorized access.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory,struct AgreementLibrary.CallbackInputs memory) returns (bytes memory)
function (contract ISuperApp,bytes memory,bool,bytes memory) external returns (bytes memory)
function (bytes memory,struct AgreementLibrary.CallbackInputs memory) returns (bytes memory)
function (contract ISuperApp,bytes memory,bool,bytes memory) external returns (bytes memory)
function (bytes memory) pure external returns (struct ISuperfluid.Context memory)
function ISuperApp.afterAgreementTerminated(contract ISuperToken,address,bytes32,bytes calldata,bytes calldata,bytes calldata) returns (bytes memory)
function ISuperApp.afterAgreementUpdated(contract ISuperToken,address,bytes32,bytes calldata,bytes calldata,bytes calldata) returns (bytes memory)
function ISuperApp.afterAgreementCreated(contract ISuperToken,address,bytes32,bytes calldata,bytes calldata,bytes calldata) returns (bytes memory)
function ISuperApp.beforeAgreementTerminated(contract ISuperToken,address,bytes32,bytes calldata,bytes calldata) view returns (bytes memory)
function ISuperApp.beforeAgreementUpdated(contract ISuperToken,address,bytes32,bytes calldata,bytes calldata) view returns (bytes memory)
function ISuperApp.beforeAgreementCreated(contract ISuperToken,address,bytes32,bytes calldata,bytes calldata) view returns (bytes memory)
function (bytes memory,contract ISuperApp,uint256,int256) external returns (bytes memory)
